name: forwardMessage

metadata.description:
forwardMessage


Send the provided payload back into the waylay system for the engine to process in other tasks.

States
  • Success: The action was executed successfully
  • Error: The action execution failed

Raw Data
  • errorMessage (only returned on Error state)

Properties
  • payload: the JSON object to send on the specified resource
  • resource: The resource you wish to forward a message to
